page.title: 13LIFE-STYLE IN BETHERSDEN
page.content: AS THE ENTIRE AREA IS RURAL,FASHION IS OF NECESSITY MORE FUNCTIONAL THAN FANCY,AND TRENDY YOUNGSTERS SEEKING THE LATEST IN CLOTHES,HAIRSTYLES OR CULTURE,NEED TO TRAVEL.PASTIMES FOR ALL AGES ARE MOSTLY OUTDOOR.THERE ARE A CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND,TENNIS COURTS AND FOOTBALL AND CRICKET PITCHES. PEOPLE WALK IN THE UNSPOILED COUNTRY AND MANY YOUNGSTERS LEARN HORSERIDING. CARING FOR HORSES AND OTHER PETS TAKES UP A FAIR AMOUNT OF PEOPLES LEISURE TIME.MOST HOUSEHOLDS HAVE THEIR OWN GARDEN PRODUCING FRUIT,FLOWERS AND VEGETABLES.ALTHOUGH GARDENS ARE HARD WORK,FOR MANY PEOPLE THEY PROVIDE HOURS OF PLEASURE AS WELL AS GOOD EXERCISE.THERE ARE THREE THRIVING PUBLIC HOUSES.THEY OFFER A VARIETY OF GAMES AND SERVE GOOD FOOD AND DRINK FOR ALL FROM SNACKS TO CELEBRATION MEALS.RURAL LIFE IS NOT AT ALL DULL.
